app_descript:
Scribble Rider

Brief: Scribble Rider is an action-packed game where creativity and quick thinking are your greatest tools. The premise of the game revolves around designing wheels that can traverse a variety of terrains. As you progress through unique levels, you will be met with challenges that necessitate the drawing of wheels suited for water, land, and everything in between. Your custom designs will impact your performance as you race against opponents, striving for dominance in this highly engaging and addictive game.
